title: STUDIO APT. WITH AiR CONDITIONING & SPECTACULAR VIEWS
map_address: 5292 S Maryland Pkwy near Tropicana Ave.
app_fee: $45 application fee for credit and background screening
posting_body: Mingle with neighbors in a shared living room and kitchen while enjoying your cozy studio at Quail Ridge.
These studio homes have their own private entries, as well as spacious patios and balconies featuring scenic views of the property.
Settle in and make this layout entirely yours.
Add décor to built-in shelving and fill the extra-large closets with your wardrobe.
You can find your ideal temperature with the help of individual climate controls and complement it with the cool breeze from the ceiling fan.
The community invites you to lounge poolside, join neighbors in a game of billiards, or enjoy barbecuing in the picnic area.
Less than a mile away, you can treat yourself to the plant-based specialties at Panchos Vegan Tacos Tropicana.
Call today to learn more about living at Quail Ridge.
5292 S Maryland Pkwy Las Vegas, NV 89119
Managed By: ConAm Management Equal Housing Opportunity
